author: ieb
msg: SHINDIG-680
Patch from Ben Smith
When a Person is created in PersonPopulate they have 3 Organizations added, then 3 more added. At the moment, the List of Organizations is just re-set to the original 3.
Thanks

author: rjung
msg: Move curUserPattern from a global variable to
a method variable.
Not necessary at the moment, because the realm
is mostly synchronized, but being global doesn't
help and will hurt once we implement connection
pooling and concurrent usage for the realm.

author: sobryan
msg: TRINIDAD-1287 - Threadlocal system does not clean up on init
* Took work done for TRINIDAD-1273 and applied a call to the cleanup
code at the end of init and destroy.

author: ieb
msg: SHINDIG-562
This is a working version with all tests enabled.
The GuiceBeanConverter uses an annotation (after looking at Evan's approach) to identify
those interfaces in the model that must be serialised using getters and setters.
The schema has been updated to 0.8.1 and a bit beyond to make it match both the JSON and
PoCo, although this is not complete.

author: jwaldman
msg: TRINIDAD-1291 ThreadLocalUtils blows up if a referenced ThreadLocal has been GC'ed
(removed iterator.remove(); for null threadLocal)
